description: Change of use of ground floors from hot food takeaway (sui generis) to self-contained flats (Class C3).
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the approved plans, as set out in the attached schedule which forms part of this notice. 3267/1; 3267/2; 3267/3B; Location Plan; Block Plan; Noise impact assessment; Surveyors report for No78; Surveyors report for No80; Daylight/Sunlight assessment; 3267/4; Car free agreement.Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Prior to first occupation for the permitted use of the development, the details of the ventilation system demonstrated in the Noise impact assessment dated 20/04/2022 and plan ref: 3267/3B, shall be implemented in complete accordance with the details hereby approved and thereafter be retained as such in perpetuity.Reason: In the interests of amenity.

Prior to first occupation for the permitted use, details of refuse storage facilities to be provided within the development have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.  The facilities shall be provided in accordance with the approved details before the development is occupied or use commences. Reason:  In the interests of amenity.
